resources.string: Set færslu inn og hleð upp mynd…
Niðurhal gagna er í gangi…\nVinsamlegast reyndu aftur eftir nokkrar sekúndur eða skoðaðu internet tenginguna þína.
Dagsetningar í framtíðinni eru ekki leyfðar.
This geocacher reported that there is a problem with this cache.
This geocacher reported that the logbook is full.
This geocacher reported that the container is damaged.
This geocacher reported that the cache might be missing.
This geocacher reported that there is a problem with this cache.
This geocacher reported that this geocache should be archived. A community volunteer reviewer has been notified.
Þýðing getur mistekist ef textinn er langur.
Næ ekki sambandi við Geocaching.com. Síðan gæti legið niðri eða tækið ekki nettengt.
Næ ekki sambandi við Extremcaching.com. Síðan gæti legið niðri eða tækið ekki nettengt.
Unable to contact Geocaching.su. The website may be down or your internet connection not working.
Gat ekki náð sambandi við GeoKrety.org. Vefsíðan gæti legið niðri eða internet tengingin þín virkar ekki.
c:geo getur ekki tengs. Vistuð cache virka í c:geo án netsambands. Athugaðu innskráningarstillingu eða opnaðu fyrir netsamband.
Unknown error. Please refer to our FAQ for guidance.
c:geo was unable to map this address to an existing location
Unknown communication error. Please refer to our FAQ for guidance.
Geocaching.com liggur niðri vegna viðhalds. Vistuð cache virka í c:geo án netsambands.
Þú hefur ekki samþykkt skilmála Geocaching.com svo c:geo getur ekki sýnt staðsetningarhnit cache-ins.
Þú verður fyrst að staðfesta aðgang þinn á Geocaching.com.
Umbeðinn kassi hefur ekki verið birtur.
Þetta cache er eingöngu í boði fyrir Premium áskrifendur Geocaching.com.
c:geo getur ekki opnað geocatch upplýsingar.
c:geo getur ekki sýnt geokassann sem þú vilt. Er þetta í alvörunni geokassi?
c:geo found no spoiler images for this cache.
Er enn að vinna í öðru verki.
c:geo finnur ekki forrit við hæfi.
c:geo is unable to log your visit. Please log your visit from the full cache details screen.
c:geo gat ekki náð í kassa.
c:geo failed to download cache details.
c:geo getur ekki náð í lýsingu.
Please enter a device name before registering.
Selecting an image for the log failed.
c:geo can\'t display the trackable you want. Is it really a trackable?
c:geo getur ekki opnað upplýsingar um ferðalang.
Ekki er hægt að skrá færslu fyrir þennan ferðalang.
c:geo getur ekki fundið þennan ferðalang.
c:geo doesn\'t know to which cache you want to add a waypoint for.
c:geo failed to add your waypoint.
Skráðu inn bæði legu og vegalengd. Lega er horn frá 0 til 360 gráðum frá norðri. Vegalengd þarfnast ekki mælieiningar.
c:geo gat ekki náð í nauðsynleg gögn til að skrá heimsókn þína.
It seems that your log was not posted. Please check it on the cache originating website.
It seems that your log was not posted. Please check it on Extremcaching.com.
It seems that your log was not posted. Please check it on GeoKrety.org.
It seems that your log image was not uploaded. Please check it on the cache originating website.
c:geo getur hvorki þáttað lengdargráðu né breiddargráðu.
Could not load the selected render theme. Reverting to the built-in one.
The selected render theme is not valid for this mapsforge version. Reverting to the built-in one.
Það er ekkert sem þarf að vista.
There are no caches with coordinates.
Engin virk geocaching þjónusta býður upp á þessa leit.
Enter an address or location name. For example use a postal address \"Radlicka 100, Prague, Czech Republic\", a city name \"Berlin\" or just a name of something like \"Yellowstone Park\".
Enter the code for a geocache. For example \"GC1VCAZ\".
Enter all or part of a geocache\'s name. For example \"Night Cache\".
Enter the code for a trackable. For example \"TB29QMZ\".
Settu inn einhvern texta í færsluna þína.
c:geo gat ekki náð í myndir.

The selected map file is not a valid mapsforge map file or uses an unsupported version.
(c:geo currently supports v3 to v5 / v3 only if you are using "Old Mapfsforge V3" setting.)

Offline maps are not available.
The selected map file does not exist.\nOffline maps are not available.
Character must be a LETTER or a DIGIT
Not logged in. Live map will only show caches stored locally.

Not logged in (yet). Live map will only show caches stored locally and online functions will not work.

Either there is no network connection, a server problem or you have to (re)configure your geocaching services.

Do you want to configure services now?
Villa kom upp við að lesa vasafyrirspurnarlista.
c:geo hefur tekist að setja færsluna inn.
c:geo hefur tekist að vista færsluna.
Type of log has been changed!
Image selection or capture was cancelled.
The cache has been stored locally
Be sure to save waypoint if you want to keep the calculator state.
Logging %1$s from c:geo cannot be done anonymously. Do you want to open the settings to fill in your credentials from %2$s?
Sorry, cannot find a suitable preference screen.
c:geo failed to get cache popup info.
c:geo failed to load additional data (trackables/favorite points) for logging.
Your Google Play Service is outdated. Do you want to switch to Mapsforge map provider instead?
Default map switched to Mapsforge map provider. Restart your map now.
c:geo can scan geocodes which are printed as QR code. The necessary app is not installed. Do you want to open Google Play to install it?
Didn\'t find any geocodes in the scan result.
Do you want to upload modified coordinates for all (selected) caches and overwrite the existing coordinates on the server? This cannot be undone.

This will overwrite the existing coordinates on the server for all (selected) caches of your list with the current listing coordinates in c:geo! This is to be used only in special cases, e. g. when you imported a GPX file which contains corrected coordinates as listing coordinates. This cannot be undone and you should only use it, if you know what you are doing. In normal cases you might rather want to use the function \"Upload modified coordinates\" in the same menu.
c:geo gat ekki búið til nýja listann
Viltu eyða þessum lista? Öll cache sem hann inniheldur verða færð í \"geymslu\".
Listinn er tómur. Viltu fjarlægja þennan lista?
Listi ekki lengur til, skipti í staðlaðan lista

Geocaching is an outdoor game to search and find so-called \"caches\". This app can be used to play this game.\n\nYou can read more about c:geo Basics in our user guide: https://manual.cgeo.org/en/basicuse

c:geo needs certain permissions on your device:
Location: access to the GPS to locate your position and calculate distance and direction to geocaches
Storage: write data onto your phone storage when you save geocaches for offline use, for import/export of files and reading of offline maps

Without these permissions you will not be able to use c:geo.

In order to use c:geo, you need an account for a geocaching platform of your choice (independent of this app). You have to configure this account in c:geo service settings before you can use c:geo!\n\nYou can read more about c:geo First steps in our user guide: https://manual.cgeo.org/en/firststeps
Please include the following system information when sending a bug report or asking for more information about c:geo:

· all our translation contributors on Crowdin.net!
· all issue creators
· and all other supporters.
Configure user account information and access to optional services.
Stilla mælieiningar, tungumál og liti á appi.
Customize the display of cache information.
Configure the data to be saved for offline use, the storage location and directories for GPX files.
Configure your signature and set logging options.
Set map source, offline map settings and map details.
Færsla geocache gagna gæti tekið mjög langan tíma, en það fer eftir tækinu þínu og magni gagna.
Choose preferred navigation methods and select external navigation apps.
Configure app directories and other system specific settings.
Með því að nota þjónustu geocaching.com, samþykkir þú notkunarskilmála Groundspeak.
You can\'t make c:geo login to geocaching.com with your Facebook account. But there is a simple workaround…
Veita c:geo aðgang að geocaching.com til að leita að kössum.
Veita c:geo aðgang að extremcaching.com til að leita að kössum og skoða/sía þá kassa sem þú hefur fundið.
Veita c:geo aðgang að geocaching.su til að leita að kössum.
Authorize c:geo with opencaching.de to search for caches and access/filter your found caches.
Authorize c:geo with opencaching.pl to search for caches and access/filter your found caches.
Authorize c:geo with opencaching.nl to search for caches and access/filter your found caches.
Authorize c:geo with opencaching.us to search for caches and access/filter your found caches.
Authorize c:geo with opencaching.ro to search for caches and access/filter your found caches.
Veita c:geo aðgang að opencache.uk til að leita að kössum og skoða/sía þá kassa sem þú hefur fundið.
To be able to rate a cache, you need to follow the instructions at GCVote.com and enter your GCVote password here.
Error while sending rating, check GCVote password in settings or empty it.
Local time invalid, adjust device time
Það lítur út fyrir að þetta app sé ekki uppsett
Staðgengilstextar eins og [NAME] munu breytast þegar þetta sniðmát er notað.
Sjá dóma um cache frá GCvote.com
Display additional logbook page for friends\' and own logs
Open details with last used page
Show address instead of coordinates on main screen
Útiloka cache sem þú átt eða hefur fundið
If less than the given amount of caches are displayed on the map, their waypoints are shown additionally.
If mapping a single cache: Should zoom be adjusted to include all its waypoints?
Maximum distance up to which brouter helper app (if installed) will calculate a route.
If routing is active: Show the straight distance in addition to the calculated route length.
Nota breskar mælieiningar í staðinn fyrir metrakerfið
Enable Offline Logging (Won\'t show online log screen when logging, won\'t upload logs)
Ask which list to store caches in
Show additional lists in cache list
Please note that this feature will backup/restore a database containing caches and waypoints only, but not your cache images and no program settings.
c:geo\'s database was successfully copied to:
Það mistókst að taka afrit af gagnagrunni c:geo.
Gagnagrunnurinn er tómur, óþarfi að taka öryggisafrit.
Do you want to overwrite the existing backup from %s?
Do you want to overwrite %s on your device with the backup?
Restoration failed: Backup file corrupt, database had to be recreated.
Database is empty. Do you want to restore the database backup?
There is no file with a backup.
Perform backup and restore of cache/waypoint data and program settings.
Do you want to store sensitive account related data? Those may be readable by other applications.
Do you want to overwrite your current settings?
There is no settings backup available
c:geo needs to be restarted now to bring loaded settings into effect
c:geo supports maps for offline use. You can download maps from Mapsforge or even create your own maps from OSM data. You need to select the offline map directory first to get offline map support.

c:geo supports custom themes for offline maps. These can be used to change the color style of the map (e.g. to have a nightview map) or to highlight certain objects like cycle paths or height lines within the map.
Scale text labels on offline map according to device dpi
Disable controls for manual map rotation
You may choose to store the additional data for geocaches (spoilers, log images, …) on your external storage (emulated or real external SD card depending on your device).
Open share menu after GPX export
Download directional arrow image if necessary (only required for Basic Members)
Here you can select your preferred navigation tool.
Here you can select your second preferred navigation tool. Activate it by long pressing the navigation icon next to the title of the cache.
Here you can select which of the available navigation methods will be shown in the navigation menu for a cache or waypoint. Disabled tools are not installed on this device.

c:geo can generate a lot of debugging information. Activating this setting will affect the stability of c:geo and is only recommended if you are asked to send a log to the developers. Please keep debug logging disabled during normal usage of c:geo!

You may store the database of c:geo either system internally or in a directory on your user storage. Having it on the user storage may free some memory, but you may lose a bit of performance and c:geo will not work if the storage is not accessible or you remove the database file.
Moving the Geocache data directory partly or completely failed. Please check old and new directories and move by hand if necessary.
Identify as Android browser. Solves login problems when using certain network providers.

c:geo stores images, log images and other files related to a cache in a separate directory. In some cases (like importing/exporting the database) this directory may contain outdated files, which can be deleted here.
On devices equipped with Google Play Services, c:geo can automatically use a better geolocation provider. However, this prevents the use of an external BlueTooth GPS receiver.
The low-power mode avoids using the GPS and the gyroscope when a highly accurate location is not strictly necessary, at the cost of longer fixing times.
On some devices, the regular rotation vector sensor behaves erratically, giving the wrong direction. In this case, an alternate sensor (the orientation sensor) may provide better results.

Hardware acceleration renders graphical elements faster on the screen. However on some devices the Android operating system contains bugs and some text may appear blurred (notably bold characters). Disable hardware acceleration if this happens to you.
We are using a new version of the Mapsforge map by default. If you miss some features or encounter issues you can go back to the old version here.
Play a single notification if any cache or waypoint currently visible on the map is closer than far distance or near distance. Different tones are used for the two distances.

Play a repeated notification if the currently selected cache or waypoint is closer than far distance or near distance. Works if cache or waypoint details are opened, cache or waypoint popups on map are shown or compass is active. Different tones are used for the two distances.
Upplýsingar um að senda til c:geo

Send2cgeo allows you to send caches to your Android device directly from geocaching.com using a special plugin for Firefox or Chrome. Before registering, please see https://send2.cgeo.org/. You only need to register if you want to use send2cgeo. c:geo will work normally without registering your device.
Registration successful. PIN code is %d. Use it on the c:geo website to connect this device to your browser.
c:geo failed to download caches. No internet connection, or send2cgeo is down.
c:geo failed to download caches. Registration for send2cgeo expired. Please register in settings.
Connected as %s.\nPress here to update or long press to remove authorization data from c:geo.
The following process will allow c:geo to access %s.
Pressing the \"authorize c:geo\" button will start the process. This process will open up a web browser with a %s page. Log in on this page and allow c:geo to access your account. That\'s all.
You\'ll be disconnected from this service. Your currently saved credentials will be lost.
The following process will allow c:geo to access %s.
Filling your credentials and pressing the \"Check authentication\" button will start the process. This process will connect to %s and validate your credentials. That\'s all.
The following process will allow c:geo to access %s.
Filling your credential and pressing the \"authorize c:geo\" button will start the process. This process will connect to %s and retrieve an authentication token. That\'s all.
c:geo má núna setja inn á Twitter.
c:geo má núna eiga samskipti við %s.
c:geo má núna eiga samskipti við %s.
fáanlegt í síðasta lagi í dag
This personal note will be truncated after %d characters by Geocaching.com.
Description contains table formatting which may need to be viewed at %s to be seen correctly.
Þessi kassi er á vaktlistanum þínum.
Þessi kassi er á vaktlistanum þínum (Vaktarar: %1d).
Þessi kassi er ekki á vaktlistanum þínum.
Þessi kassi er ekki á vaktlistanum þínum (Vaktarar: %1d).
Þessi kassi er einn af þínum uppáhalds.
Þessi kassi er ekki einn af þínum uppáhalds.
Ignoring a cache means that this cache will never occur again when loading data from geocaching.com. You will only be able to see the cache again by unignoring it on the website.
This is a user defined cache

This cache stores your recent \"Go to\" targets. It is automatically created once you have used the \"Go to\" function in the main menu. The coordinates entered there will be stored into waypoints of this cache. If you do no longer need these coordinates you can safely delete this cache or any of its waypoints. Also you can move the cache to any other list of your choice.
Long tap on map to create a user defined cache

No files found in default folders:
%1$s

Searching whole SD card for files:
Waiting for new caches from send2cgeo…
Setja sem hnit kassa í c:geo
Setja sem hnit kassa í c:geo og á vefsíðunni
Cache coordinates have been reset on website.
Endurstilla í c:geo og á heimasíðu
Website doesn\'t support modifying cache coordinates.
Error occurred while modifying coordinates on website.
Cache coordinates on website have been modified to: %s.
Hide original waypoints on the map
Hide parking waypoints on the map
Hide visited waypoints on the map
Loading a list of Pocket Queries
Dagsetning viðburðar er í fortíðinni. Viltu samt bæta honum við?
Enables you to open a contact card (of your address book) directly from a log entry, so you can more easily ask friends for help.
Senda í c:geo er viðbót í vafra fyrir tölvuna þína. Þegar þú ert að skoða geocaching.com, getur þú sent kassa í snjallsímann þinn beint úr netvafranum þínum.
Outdoor navigation app for your phone or tablet. View topo maps offline, track your route, hunt geocaches, use a voice guide and do even more.
Þú getur notað radarinn í þessu forriti samhliða c:geo. Forritið bíður einnig upp á mikið af öðrum GPS tengdum upplýsingum.
Leyfir þér að nota utanáliggjandi GPS móttakara til þess að fá nákvæmari staðsetningarupplýsingar, og getur sparað rafhlöðuna í tækinu þínu.
GPS Locker keeps GPS signal active when switching between applications and when your device\'s screen is off.
There are Greasemonkey scripts and websites which enable display of geocodes as barcodes. With this app, c:geo can read such geocodes directly from the screen of your computer.
Allows easy creation and download of Pocket Queries centred on your current position or a point selected from a map. Requires a Premium Geocaching.com account.

If you download translation packages in the Google Translate app, then you can easily translate cache descriptions in c:geo by a long tap on the cache description text (without an Internet connection).
WhereYouGo allows playing and searching geocaches of type Wherigo. c:geo can automatically trigger the download of cartridges within this app.
BRouter provides offline routing. If it is installed and has the necessary files downloaded, c:geo will automatically show a route to the cache on the internal map.
Field Notes will be exported to /sdcard/field-notes with the current date and time as their file name.
The GPX file will be exported to %1$s with the current date and time as its file name.
Not a lost and found tour
Hyperlink to another caching portal only
Not only a hyperlink to another caching portal
Not only available at specified times
Don\'t ask owner for start conditions
Available at specified hours (may require access fee)
Hidden in natural surroundings (forests, mountains, etc.)
Description doesn\'t contain an audio file
To make geocaching easier, to make users lazier.
Á c:geo að setja inn nýja færslu á Twitter í hvert skipti sem þú skráir heimsókn þína?
Ný útgáfa fáanleg.\nSmelltu til að setja upp.
New nightly build available.\nClick to install.
New release candidate available.\nClick to install.
Nýlegar breytingar á geocaching.com brutu c:geo.\nVið erum að vinna í því, athugaðu aftur síðar.
Recent changes on geocaching.com broke the live map feature.\nWe are working on it, check again soon.
geocaching.com is under maintenance.\nYou might run into various issues.
You appear to be using a version of Android older than 4.1. Future releases of c:geo might no longer be available for your device.
The current language is not supported by text-to-speech.
You want to log \'%s\'. Are you sure?
You want to report \'%s\'. Are you sure?
Heimila c:geo með GeoKrety.org að skrá GeoKrety ferðalanga.
You\'re about to send a log without a Geocode. It\'s encouraged to set one. Do you want to add it now?
Gat ekki þáttað svarið frá GeoKrety.
Show a direction line to the navigation target

plurals.name: fav_points_remaining
plurals.item: Add this cache to favorites (%d remaining)
Add this cache to favorites (%d remaining)

resources.string: Þessi aðgerð getur leitt til mikillar netnotkunar. Ertu viss um að þú viljir endurhlaða alla kassa?
geocaching.com coordinate checker available via browser
Gat ekki bætt viðburðarkassa á dagatalið
The geocache data directory is running low on storage space. This can cause malfunctions of c:geo. Please free up some space.
c:geo is running in debug mode!
The debug mode causes instabilities! Do you want to deactivate the debug mode?
Image too big, please select a smaller scale.
A caption is required for the image
c:geo needs access to the GPS on your device to locate your position and calculate distance and direction to geocaches. It cannot be used without this permission.

c:geo will write data onto your phone storage or SD card as soon as you save geocaches for offline use. Furthermore c:geo will use your phone storage for import and export of files and reading of offline maps. It cannot be used without this permission.
This function is not possible without storage permission.
Entered value is too small - reset to min value
Entered value is too large - reset to max value
